definition: see 磅秤 scale/platform balance/(loanword) pound (unit of weight, about 454 grams)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: LBS. minimum pull-out force in direction indicated.
sentences.chinese: 標示出至少7磅的外拉力及其方向。

sentences.english: The goods we packed in new and sound jute bags each containing about 200 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 貨物是用堅固的新麻袋包裝的，每袋約重200磅。

sentences.english: Last week I gained another five pounds.
sentences.chinese: 上週我體重又增加了五磅。

sentences.english: Each fish weighs three pounds or so.
sentences.chinese: 每一條魚稱起來都有三磅左右的重量。

sentences.english: The deer dressed out over one hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這隻鹿去毛開膛後淨重100多磅。

sentences.english: Demonstrate that the make-up cathead can pull 7000 Ibs.
sentences.chinese: 證明上扣警備錨頭能拉到7000磅。
外科醫生救了這條重達60磅的爬蟲。

sentences.english: People were rationed to a pound of meat a week.
sentences.chinese: 供應被限制爲一星期一磅肉。

sentences.english: The placebo group only lost an average of 2 lbs.
The catapult shot hundred-pound rocks at the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 弩炮向敵人發射了上百磅石塊。

sentences.english: A single cell can store 2,000,000 foot-pounds of energy.
sentences.chinese: 一個電池能蓄存二百萬英尺磅的能。

sentences.english: How many pounds of snails did you buy?
There is a shortage of 1,450 pounds in this shipment.
sentences.chinese: 這批運輸的貨物短缺1450磅。

sentences.english: This year my mother will cook a twenty-five pound turkey.
sentences.chinese: 本年我媽媽會烹調一個二十五磅的火雞。

sentences.english: Sonic booms are measured in pounds per square foot of overpressure.
sentences.chinese: 音爆是以每平方英尺的超壓磅數來測量的。

sentences.english: My body had withered away to a mere 65 pounds but my faith and will were rock solid.
sentences.chinese: 我的體重下降到只有65磅，但我的信念卻堅如磐石。

definition: foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
to replay string instrument/fig. to harp on the same string/to raise the same old topic again
